entries.title: Wizards of the Coast fully retreats from D&D license changes after community outrage
entries.description: Open Gaming License 1.0 is here to stay, baby.

entries.title: The Dead Space remake will blur out 'disturbing scenes' if you want it to
entries.description: The new game includes two new filters that will warn you of potentially sensitive content, or cover it up entirely.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 director: New ranked system suffers from 'poor comprehension,' will change in future seasons
entries.description: Blizzard hopes to create "more clarity" around ranks in seasons 3 and 4.

entries.title: 16 weird reasons games disappear from Steam
entries.description: Expiring  rights, exclusive deals, sexual content, shady developer practices—and once in a while, because the game just isn't good.

entries.title: Steam launches a new 'Discovery Hub' dedicated to DLC
entries.description: The DLC Discovery Hub is the latest new feature to come out of Steam Labs.

entries.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened invites you to cross-examine the creepiest evil doll I've ever seen
entries.description: Investigations get weird as the famous detective delves into the Lovecraft mythos for this clever crossover

entries.title: The Last of Us has already been renewed for season 2
entries.description: Possibly the least surprising news of the day: HBO's hit show is coming back for more.

entries.title: Nintendo brings back rare Pokémon card 23 years later after famous magician drops lawsuit: 'I was a fool'
entries.description: Uri not gonna believe this.

entries.title: The HTC Vive XR Elite is so light I damn near stole it
entries.description: I genuinely almost walked out of that HTC press event with a $1,100 XR headset on

entries.title: The best Dishonored game goes free on the Epic Store next week
entries.description: It's the best because it's free.

entries.title: That procgen road trip game is getting a genre-shifting prequel
entries.description: Authoritarian regimes and banging beats.

entries.title: AMD Ryzen 9 7900
entries.description: AMD's leaner, meaner 12-core CPU runs Intel very close.

entries.title: AMD Ryzen 7 7700
entries.description: Less than 'X' is definitely more, but those pesky Intel hybrid CPU are still awfully tough to beat.

entries.title: Space Marine 2 devs: 'This war isn't just in front of you, it's all the way up to the horizon'
entries.description: Fight hundreds of alien monsters at once in the bigger, meaner Space Marine 2.

entries.title: Forspoken DirectStorage on test: Contrary to reports, there's no GPU performance hit on an RTX 4090
entries.description: But weirdly, you will see higher fps on a hard drive if you're willing to wait

entries.title: Intel has reportedly eliminated a big bottleneck in its Arc GPUs in an upcoming driver release
entries.description: After December's DX9 fixes, a new GPU driver bottleneck has been identified.

entries.title: Legend recreates entire Radiohead album with Mario 64 sounds, even Jonny Greenwood likes it
entries.description: In Rainbow Roads.

entries.title: Last year's most ridiculous FMV game is getting a VR version
entries.description: "If VR was invented for anything, it was the simulation of pushing important-looking red buttons".

entries.title: Intel maintains next-gen Meteor Lake CPUs still 'on track' for this year despite $700M losses
entries.description: Intel's revenues down by over 30%, but next-gen CPUs due later this year.

entries.title: How to unlock Deadpool in Marvel's Midnight Suns
entries.description: Deadpool has entered the chat.

entries.title: Like A Dragon: Ishin brings that Yakuza flair regardless of the era
entries.description: Yakuza + samurai swords = fun.

entries.title: Darktide studio admits the state of the game means promised features are being 'pushed back'
entries.description: In the grim darkness of the far future there is only early access.

entries.title: Vampire survival game passes three million sold, is adding castles with multiple floors
entries.description: The mob is thirsty for V Rising.

entries.title: Russia says popular games have 'hidden inserts' targeting its youth, and it wants to whip up a ban list
entries.description: A commission investigating the matter wants to stop "malware and prohibited content" from corrupting the young.

entries.title: AMD's new GPUs are pretty poor value according to...AMD
entries.description: AMD blog post publishes damning data about the value of its own new GPUs.

entries.title: How to fix the Comms Array in Dead Space
entries.description: Solve this puzzle to send out a distress call.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #587, January 27
entries.description: Get some help with Friday's Wordle.

entries.title: Valve's unusual corporate structure causes its problems, report suggests
entries.description: Employees interviewed by People Make Games blame Valve's lack of diversity and poor record shipping games on its flat structure.

entries.title: I'm instantly hooked on this colony sim where you build a town on the ocean
entries.description: Havendock is oozing with quirky charm, fun management systems, and (mostly) helpful little NPCs.

entries.title: This dreamlike indie RPG is a dense, perfectly refined bite of Elder Scrolls
entries.description: Dread Delusion loses the faff in favor of dense, imm-sim detail, I just wish it was already out of early access.
